data.title: About Me
data.text: I'm a tech enthusiast with a background in international business, and I have a deep passion for problem-solving and continuous learning. After spending five years in logistics and running my own caf√©, I made a career transition into the tech field, where I combine my technical skills with strong communication and customer support abilities.*Currently, I'm a Support Engineer at HP, where I focus on troubleshooting, resolving complex issues, and providing excellent support to our partners. Additionally, I serve as the onboarding lead for HPID, our single sign-on API. In this role, I've gained expertise in troubleshooting, API integrations, and process management, all while collaborating with cross-functional teams to improve customer experiences.*I thrive in dynamic environments, enjoy tackling challenges, and am always eager to learn something new every day.
